Text: Thank you so much, you rock!!

I had to make an account just to comment.  You have NO idea how much my 2.5 y/o and I are going to appreciate these.  He's been watching Season 1 for well over a year, repeat, repeat...  I've been looking for S02 for what feels like forever.  Looking forward to discovering some new fave episodes!  Will seed for a LONG time, until the LO tires of it.
